nodes.text: Midakinos was a moon in orbit around the gas giant Ovise V, in the Ovise system of the Moddell sector.

Midakinos was a barren, frigid satellite, and the fourth moon of Ovise V. It was inhabited by Humans, though the atmosphere required the population to wear breath masks. A day lasted for 31 standard hours and its orbital period lasts 300 standard days.
